transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji. Hello. Sir meri baat Mr. Satya Prakash ji se ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Satya Prakash ji namaskar main Asha bol rahi hu IndiaMART se customer head hu sir main yaha pe. Sir aapki na meri team se bhi baat chal rahi thi Nidhi ji se aur Shweta ji se.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan. Sir pehle sabse pehle confirm karna chahti hu abhi sahi samay hai na aapke baat kar sakte hai do minute?
Customer: Aapka aawaz mein bahut jyada matlab goonj raha hai kuch.
Executive: Okay. Ab ek minute sir. Ek minute hold kariyega. Haan. Satya Prakash ji ab aawaz aa rahi hai meri aapko theek se?
Customer: Haan ab theek hai.
Executive: Haan. Sir mujhe ye jaanna hai ki aapka na abhi meri team shayad Nidhi ji se aapki subah se baat ho rahi hai jisme Nidhi ne mujhe ye bataya ki mam sir ka ek presence hai hamare paas old presence aur aapke paas ek naya presence hai jo aap do mahine pehle jisse onboard hue.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai? Rudram Enterprises karke. Bilkul sahi bilkul sahi hai sir?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Okay. Sir to aapne na aaj morning mein ek concern raise kiya ki kya kehte hai mere ko mere ko pata hi nahi nahi tha ki mera old STS pe hona tha ye sab cheez. Lekin aapki jo presence hai sir Rudram Enterprises jo aapne do mahine pehle onboard hui thi to ye to do mahine ho gaye to aaj matlab aaj kaise aapko ye laga ki mera dusre STS pe hona chahiye tha ya matlab isse kya fark padne wala hai sir?
Customer: Matlab laga iski vajah se kyunki kya hai exposure jo hai na isme dikha raha hai do saal ka. Aur IndiaMART pe jab hum client se in sab se baat karte hai actually main aapko scenario batata hu last time abhi mujhe ek bande ne ye bola ki aap to abhi IndiaMART pe naye ho.
Hmm. Unko profile kahan se pata chala ya kya hua maine unko bataya ki nahi hum log to 2015-16 se kaam kar rahe hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Kehte hai ki IndiaMART pe to IndiaMART ko to aapka matlab pura knowledge nahi hoga aap abhi IndiaMART pe naye ho. Maine kaha nahi naya
Customer: Nahi profile to mera kaafi purana hai.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Kehte hai nahi bhai sahab do saal hi hua aapko to. To un sab cheezon se leke na mujhe fir thoda mind click hua fir maine apni team ke sath discuss kiya ki ye bhi ek exposure bhi client ko leke thoda jyada matter kar raha hai. Fir humne dono ka check kiya to usme approx eight year aa raha hai seven point something hai aur isme sirf do saal aa raha hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To isko dekhte hue humne socha ki ab hume karna chahiye change kyunki ye samne ek ne ek client ne agar dekha hai to auron ke nazar mein bhi jayega.
Executive: Okay. To sir. Aur fir kya hai na trust issue trust issue aa raha hai ki matlab naya banda hai karna chahiye kaam nahi karna chahiye to client ka na trust issue bhi aata hai. Agar banda purana hota hai proper kaam kar raha hota hai to banda ye kehta hai ki haan bhai purana aadmi kaafi time se kaam kar raha hai to koi baat nahi kar sakte hai.
Executive: Okay. Lekin Mr. sir dekhiye kaisa hai ki aapka jo hamare paas old presence hai theek hai wo aapko bhi malum hoga sir wo ek to different GSTs hai theek hai pehli baat aur usi GST pe aap partnership pe the us wale GST pe aapke partnership ke sath wo wo STS hai hamare paas plus aapka jo ye wala profile hai Rudram Enterprises ye aapki own proprietorship mein hai ye wali. Sir ek minute ek minute line pe rahiye ga ek minute.
Executive: Haan ji. Haan ji bilkul sir.
(silence)
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello haan ji sir bataiye.
Customer: Haan bataiye.
Executive: Haan. Sir to fir main yehi bol rahi thi ki aap ye bataiye ki ab dekhiye waha pe aapka jo GST chal raha hai aur dekhiye humne jab aapko onboard kiya tab bhi humne bilkul ye bata ke gaya hoga both are the different identity hai na wo aapka partnership mein chal raha tha ya aapka haan.
Customer: Actually yahi to problem hai na yahi to main problem yahi hai ki jab maine isko purchase kiya matlab purchase karne ka jo process chal raha tha us time matlab dono dono companies ka jo purchase hua tha wo matlab subscription karne wala banda same tha jo hamara field field ka aapka dekh raha hoga. Matlab us bande ko already pata hoga ki haan theek hai ki aapka pehle ka chal raha hai usme merge karwa sakte hai aisa kuch aap naya kyun khol rahe ho aisa koi bhi discussion nahi hua us bande ne ye kaha ki bhai fatafat payment aa jaye hath mein aur fatafat start kar do nuksan to usme mera hua na ab main is vajah se main blame proper nahi kar raha hu kyunki actually kya hai ki proper blame karne se fir ye rahega ki haan bhai aapne kuch bataya nahi ya fir aapki taraf se kuch hua nahi are aap policy aapko pata hai company ka jab banda pehle se enroll ho chuka hai to aapko uske bare mein batana chahiye ki haan bhi isi enroll ko hum log update kar sakte hai ya fir isi us pe chal jayega to wo fir information mujhe nahi mili us time pe bhi.
Executive: Okay. To sir lekin Nidhi to aapko do teen Shweta to aapko do teen mahine se follow up kar rahi thi theek hai kyunki aapka us STS ke pe aapka renewal bhi hai subscription aapka wo ho raha hai close ho raha hai to us pe aapko Shweta ko aaj hi aapne bataya matlab do teen din pehle se Shweta aapke sath connect mein thi.
Customer: Actually kya hai main batata hu main batata hu uska reason. Actually kya hai ki jis time pe enroll hua tha us time pe main yaha tha nahi. Main bahar gaya hua tha mere jo sath ke hai unhone enroll karwaya tha dusra kya tha ki hum log jab hum log jab ye enroll kar rahe the wo starting mein hume inka naam Balram Balram karke hai koi unhone hi hume join karwaya tha to hume ye laga ki wahi process hoga dobara agar naya lena hai to inhi bande se aap call karke baat kar lijiye mujhe ye nahi pata tha ki madam se baat karna padega iske liye ki haan bhai enroll karna hai ya fir aap matlab madam se is bare mein koi discussion nahi hua na mere dimag mein aaya.
Executive: Achcha to aapne do mahine se Shweta ko bataya hi nahi tha do teen mahine se jab se aapko follow kar rahi thi ki main ek naya subscription le chuka hu.
Customer: Nahi nahi main mujhe mujhe matlab koi IndiaMART se call aa rahe the renew ke liye aa rahe the kaafi sare aur maine unko bola tha ki nahi humne humne abhi naya le liya hai kyunki pichle wale se itne sare hamare paas ek to order jyada nahi the dusra kya tha ki LLP mein tha wo hatwana tha.
Executive: Okay sir. Ho gaya tha to uski vajah se LLP hatwana tha to ye sirf ye sab guidance hume matlab dena chahiye tha agar hume nahi pata hai to dena chahiye tha ki haan bhai ye problem ya future mein face kar sakte ho ki aapka naya account rahega to may be aapka trust issue aa sakta hai client ke sath to ye sab hume koi information nahi mil pai.
Executive: Sir ye hum samajhte hai ki samay pe aap apna catalog renew karaiye taki aapka aap is aapko ye is tarike ki fir problems face na karna pade aage.
Customer: Madam actually catalog catalog is a different thing na ye renew issue ka renew ka jo issue tha ye aapke field wale bande ko batana chahiye tha. Okay. Aur rahi baat Shweta madam ki to inka to mere paas matlab mere paas number hi save nahi tha call to aaye honge kaafi sare aaye maine ek do call pick pick kiye to unka ye kehna tha ki renew ke liye call hai renew ke liye call hai maine kaha bhai renew nahi karwana already main le chuka hu to main frustrate ho gaya fir IndiaMART ke naam se itne call hai maine pick hi nahi kiye usme unhi callo ke beech mein kya pata madam ka bhi call ho main aapko transparency is cheez ki batata hu to aur baki main jo cause hai ye hai ki field walon ko bolna chahiye tha ki aap jab already chala rahe ho dono cheez unhone start kiya hua hai same person ne initiate karwaya hai to aapko batana chahiye tha pehle kya bhai aap ye option hai aapke paas.
Executive: Okay. But lekin sir dekhiye aapki feedback bilkul humne wo kari hai honor kariye but lekin ye puchna chahti hu sir dekhiye do mahine se aap ye service bhi chala rahe ho theek hai achcha khasa buylead aap achcha use kar rahe ho iski presence bhi achchi hai just because ki aap ye just keh rahe ho ki buyer ka trust nahi aa raha because of vintage client hai na to lekin is is catalog mein bhi koi problem nahi hai matlab aapka jo naya onboard catalog hai mere hisab se to sir dekho abhi like wo wale mein aap bilkul surrender kar chuke ho usko us GST ko surrender kar chuke ho aap old wale ko.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Okay. To matlab mere khayal se to abhi to ARN number generate kiya hai sirf aapne waha pe GST office ko sirf request di hai to.
Customer: Nahi waha se closure waha se closure ho chuka hai matlab mere mere se hi wo hota hai enroll waha se closure ho gaya hai to keh rahe hai ki.
Executive: Jo ARN number dete hai na sir haan to jo aapko ARN number dete hai to ek soft copy bhi dete hai us ARN number ki ki hum aapki request on kar rahe hai aur is matlab it will take 10 to 12 days matlab wo aapke ARN ke baad aur wo ARN number jo jo aapne mail bheja sir wo mail aapka last month ka hai to abhi tak hua nahi hai.
Customer: Koi baat nahi main usko dobara download kar lenge wo to aap us pe status pe jaoge to status se pata chal jata hai to dobara download ho jayega koi dikkat nahi hai uski aap aaj ke kahoge aaj ke date mein download karke de denge aapko.
Executive: Theek hai. Sir dekhiye main aapko promise nahi karti ki main abhi isko kyunki dekhiye wo intern identity hai puri ki main usko kyunki waha pe aapka already ek GST chal raha tha aur aapne abhi tak wo GST cancel ke liye sirf request dala hai koi hamare paas wo nahi hai ki wo cancel hua hai ya nahi hua hai theek hai to thoda sa time dijiye internal process hai aur baki sir dekhiye yaha pe na aap isko download karaenge to aapka bhi loss hai because do mahine service chal chuki hai theek hai hum jab aapko ye wala paisa refund kar rahe honge to ye paisa aapko pro data basis se milega matlab aapka do mahine ka cost cut ke aapko paisa jayega.
Customer: Nahi nahi paisa paisa to main keh hi nahi raha hu main main to abhi tak kisi se bhi nahi kaha subah se meri do teen bando se baat hogi maine paise mujhe chahiye hi nahi maine to seedhe seedhe ye bola hua hai ki mera exposure theek hona chahiye aur aap chahe aap us payment ko aap idhar shift karo theek hai aapko naya lene mein do char hazaar ke extra ki jarurat hai wo main aur payment kar dunga agar aapko lagta hai ki haan bhai maan lo aapka jo bhi amount aap cut kar rahe ho do mahine ka cut karne ke baad jo difference bachta hai purane wale mein aur naye wale mein jo bhi difference aa raha hai main aur payment kar dunga.
Executive: Theek hai sir aap mujhe thoda sa time dijiye.
Customer: Lekin wo exposure wo exposure mujhe chahiye kyunki pata hai kya hai agar ek banda agar bolta hai to jahir si baat hai ki wo ek saal mein 10 bande bolenge aur hume inhi chhoti chhoti cheezon ko hatana hota hai isi vajah se main is cheez ke liye matlab kaafi bando se baat kar liya hai abhi ek sir ka call tha wo keh rahe hai ki possible nahi hai nahi ho payega aur main koshish karta hu.
Executive: Sir haan hum actually keh rahe hai ki do do haan do alag representative ke paas aapki company run ho rahi hai yaha pe aapka Nidhi Shweta dekhti hai waha pe aapka jo account hai wo.
Customer: Madam agar aapka jo IndiaMART hai client based company hai theek hai agar aap familiar nahi hoge client agar happy nahi hoga to fir wo IndiaMART kaise wo kaam karega ye bataiye.
Executive: Nahi bilkul sir aap theek bol rahe hai agar aap hamara requirement fulfill nahi hoga agar maine koi aapko reason aisa bataya ki haan bhai genuine nahi hai iska hum alternate kar sakte hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi sir aapne bilkul haan bilkul sahi reason bataya sir but lekin sir dekhiye.
Executive: Hamare to dono presence important hai aapki jo aap abhi hai aur jo aap.
Customer: Madam dekhiye mere paas na agar option nahi hota mere paas option nahi hota ki haan bhai theek hai mera do saal ka ek ye account hai main fir mujhe koi naya bolta chahe purana bolta main chalata rehta mujhe koi problem nahi thi lekin jab mere paas option hai mere paas already ek account hai aath saal purana to main dusra option kyun pakdu jab mere paas better option present hai to payment mujhe waha bhi karna hai yaha bhi karna hai.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi hai sir aap.
Customer: Dusra cheez kya hai ki aapka aapke yaha se mujhe ye pata chala ki kal kal ka last day hai kal kal mein hi problem hume sort out karni hai.
Executive: Theek hai koi baat nahi sir aap tension mat lijiye main jo bhi solution hoga aapko deti hu is pe resolution aap mujhe thoda sa time dijiye so that main aapko is pe aage kya further hum kar sakte hai main us pe aapko update karti hu theek hai sir.
Customer: Haan wo aap koshish kariyega ki client client familiar ho hamara matlab.
Executive: Haan haan bilkul sir bilkul sir aap bilkul nishchit rahiye is baat ke liye kahin pe bhi aapko problem nahi face karne padegi meri team pura coordinate kar rahi hai even main aap personally iske pura aapka feedback jo aapne feedback diya hai usko pura handle kar rahi hu theek hai sir.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji theek hai madam. Thank you so much namaskar sir.
Executive: Thank you madam namaskar madam. Namaskar.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants old TrustSeal exposure on new account.

- Client trust issues due to new account.

- Field team didn't inform about account options.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the concerns.

- Explained the difference in GSTs.

- Mentioned internal process for GST cancellation.

- Highlighted potential loss if account is downloaded.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will provide a resolution after review.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, exposure, gst, account, renewal, buyleads
